# MACaptionAppearanceBehavior.useContentIfAvailable

**Case**

The preference setting should be used unless the content media being played has its own custom value for this setting.

## Declaration

```swift
case useContentIfAvailable
```

## Constants

- **MACaptionAppearanceBehavior.useValue**: The preference setting should always be used.

items.description: The preference setting should always be used.
items.name: MACaptionAppearanceBehavior.useValue
